snippet: ANGELO--John. The Smithsonian Community is deeply saddened by the passing of John Angelo. Together with his wife, Judy Hart Angelo, a National Board member, John was a loyal and generous friend to the Smithsonian, strong and supportive partner in Judy's board service, gracious New York City host and leader with her in helping the institution renew its brand and external communications in this new millennium. We are grateful to have benefitted from his commitment, foresight and many contributions. Our deepest sympathies go out to John's wife, Judy, their children, Jack, Jesse and Kate and their families and friends. 1/3
